| genus = Evernia
| species = mesomorpha
| authority = {{tsl|en|William Nylander (botanist)|威廉·內蘭德爾 (植物學家)|Nyl.}}（1861）<ref name=bank/>
| synonyms=
*''Letharia mesomorpha''（Nyl.）Du Rietz（1913）<ref name=bank>{{cite web|url=http://www.mycobank.org/BioloMICS.aspx?TableKey=14682616000000067&Rec=134185&Fields=All|title=''Evernia mesomorpha''|publisher=[[MycoBank|MycoBank]]|access-date=2018-09-19|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180919132331/http://www.mycobank.org/BioloMICS.aspx?TableKey=14682616000000067&Rec=134185&Fields=All|archive-date=2018-09-19|dead-url=no}}</ref>
}}
'''扁枝衣'''（[[學名|學名]]：''Evernia mesomorpha''）是一種可以形成枝狀[[地衣|地衣]]的真菌，屬於[[子囊菌门|子囊菌门]][[茶漬綱|茶漬綱]][[茶渍目|茶渍目]][[梅衣科|梅衣科]][[扁枝衣屬|扁枝衣屬]]，與{{link-en|共球藻属|Trebouxia}}的[[綠藻|綠藻]]形成地衣<ref name=Normore/>。

==形態==
[[File:Evernia_mesomorpha.jpg|thumb]]中的扁枝衣標本]]
本種與{{link-en|共球藻属|Trebouxia}}綠藻形成的地衣呈黃綠色至黃棕色，尖端顏色較基部深<ref name=Thomson/>，外形多下垂，呈叢狀，並有許多不規則或二叉的分枝，多皺褶與縱向凹槽，每叢長度約為4-10公分，粗為0.5-1.5毫米<ref name=Brodo/>，其上有黃色至灰色的[[粉芽|粉芽]]，{{link-en|髓絲層|Medulla (lichenology)}}則為白色且較鬆散<ref name=Thomson>{{cite book|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=LDeK1AEcRj4C&pg=PA227&lpg=PA227&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha+asci&source=bl&ots=dEQ7oRPXxO&sig=IY1mhtRAuTNl-tb5zD9VSU10zic&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwidrtvEycbdAhUNKXwKHdM8BC8Q6AEwB3oECAgQAQ#v=onepage&q=Evernia%20mesomorpha%20asci&f=false|page=227|title=American Arctic Lichens: The macrolichens|author=John Walter Thomson|publisher=Columbia University Press|year=1984|isbn=0231058888}}</ref>。本種中地衣與一些同屬其他種地衣均含有{{link-en|松蘿酸|usnic acid}}與[[柔扁枝衣酸|柔扁枝衣酸]]（divaricatic acid）<ref name=Brodo/><ref name=tibet>{{cite book|url=http://read.nongyekx.cn/gopreview?title=...%EF%BC%8E扁枝衣E%EF%BC%8Emesomorpha1%EF%BC%8E地衣体极1%EF%BC%8E地...&ssid=10749857&dxid=000001010868&|title=西藏地衣|author=魏江春、姜玉梅|publisher=科学出版社|year=1986|page=67}}</ref>。

==生態==
扁枝衣對空氣污染的耐受度比[[鬍鬚地衣|鬍鬚地衣]]高，因此較常在都市附近出現，多生長在有陽光照射的樹木樹幹、樹枝上，在北美洲分布於美國北部與加拿大等[[溫帶|溫帶]]與[[寒帶|寒帶]]地區<ref name=Brodo>{{cite book|title=Lichens of North America|page=312|author=Irwin M. Brodo, Sylvia Duran Sharnoff, Stephen Sharnoff, Canadian Museum of Nature|publisher=Yale University Press|year=2001|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=YyS-hS15Ty4C&pg=PA312&lpg=PA312&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha&source=bl&ots=NsfDqDsy8C&sig=dFe7hKdczirMY97UXq6171CieoA&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwj3qK6zvcbdAhXlHzQIHfIkDIU4FBDoATAGegQIBBAB#v=onepage&q=Evernia%20mesomorpha&f=false|isbn=0300082495}}</ref>，也分布於[[印度|印度]]北部與東北部山區、[[中國|中國]]與[[北歐|北歐]]等地<ref>{{cite book|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=FBDABAAAQBAJ&pg=PA132&lpg=PA132&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha+asci&source=bl&ots=9cJQId5Icx&sig=UviuK-epCP776b395jxikdBT1WQ&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiphNKdzcbdAhVaGDQIHfRFBTkQ6AEwCHoECAgQAQ#v=onepage&q=Evernia%20mesomorpha%20asci&f=false|page=132|title=Terricolous Lichens in India: Volume 2: Morphotaxonomic Studies|editor=Himanshu Rai， Dalip K. Upreti|publisher=Springer Science & Business Media|isbn=1493903608}}</ref>，其中極地的個體長度較短<ref name=Thomson/>。扁枝衣在野外會為[[馴鹿|馴鹿]]所啃食<ref>{{cite book|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=lGK6AAAAIAAJ&q=Evernia+mesomorpha&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwi7wPDGk8ndAhXzOX0KHZe4Ahs4ChDoAQhMMAY|title=Wildlife Management Bulletin: Series 1|volume=18|page=56|publisher=Canadian Wildlife Service|year=1964}}</ref>。

==應用==
加拿大西北部的{{link-en|契帕瓦人|Chipewyan}}會從[[樺木|樺木]]上採集扁枝衣，經煎煮、冷卻後滴在眼睛上以治療[[雪盲|雪盲]]<ref name=Crawford/>。[[中醫|中醫]]也會使用扁枝衣入藥以治療咳嗽、發炎與蛇咬等<ref name=Crawford>{{Cite book|page=53|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=pUoIBgAAQBAJ&pg=PA53&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjo086MkcndAhWqHzQIHUQ4AVUQ6AEIQjAD#v=onepage&q=Evernia%20mesomorpha&f=false|title=Lichen Secondary Metabolites: Bioactive Properties and Pharmaceutical Potential|chapter=Lichens Used in Traditional Medicine|author=
Stuart D. Crawford| editor= Branislav Ranković|publisher=Springer|year=2014|isbn=3319133748}}</ref><ref>{{cite book|url=http://read.nongyekx.cn/gopreview?title=...消炎解毒长白…松罗科Usneac-eae228扁枝...&ssid=13761539&dxid=000015437783&|title=吉林省中药资源|author=邓明鲁、曲晓波|publisher=中国中医药出版社|year=2014|page=288|isbn=9787513218146}}</ref>。在中國，扁枝衣還因含有一些揮發性成分而被用於香料工業中<Ref>{{cite book|title=菌物资源学|author=李玉|publisher=中国农业出版社 |year=2013|page=299|isbn=9787109163713|url=http://read.nongyekx.cn/gopreview?title=地衣资源的其他价值&ssid=13406624&dxid=000012787736&}}</ref>。

== 近缘物种 ==
同属物種中，{{link-en|橡苔|Evernia prunastri}}形態與本種類似，但比較少見，其形態較扁平、背腹分明且有些凹痕<ref name=Medlin>{{cite book|url=https://books.google.com/books?id=-Jo0yP2-69UC&pg=PA50&lpg=PA50&dq=Evernia+mesomorpha+asci&source=bl&ots=33GCfZ9zob&sig=ReM3gQzxj-LKGDF1fh6n_TPekW8&hl=zh-TW&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwiphNKdzcbdAhVaGDQIHfRFBTkQ6AEwCXoECAAQAQ#v=onepage&q=Evernia%20mesomorpha%20asci&f=false|title=Michigan Lichens|author=Julie Jones Medlin|page=51|publisher=B. Jain Publishers|year=1996|isbn=0877370397}}</ref>，本種表面則較多稜角<ref name=Brodo/>。橡苔的表面也常有粉芽，但通常集中在同一區域，不像本種的粉芽散播於全株表面<ref name=Medlin/>。[[裸扁地衣|裸扁地衣]]（''Evernia esorediosa''）也生長於溫帶與寒帶，與本種相比，裸扁地衣較常形成子囊盤（apothecium），本種則較常形成粉芽，較少形成子囊盤<ref name=Normore>{{cite journal|title=The lichen‐forming ascomycete Evernia mesomorpha associates with multiple genotypes of Trebouxia jamesii|author=Michele D. Piercey‐Normore|year=2005|publisher=''New Phytologist''|doi=10.1111/j.1469-8137.2005.01576.x|volume=169|issue=2|page=331-344}}</ref>。2005年一則研究以[[核糖體DNA|rDNA]]序列分析[[扁枝衣屬|扁枝衣屬]]物種間的親緣關係，結果顯示該屬中，扁枝衣與裸扁地衣的關係較近，來自兩物種的許多樣本共同形成一個[[演化支|演化支]]<ref name=Normore/>。''[[Evernia_perfragilis|Evernia perfragilis]]''的質地較本種硬、脆，乾燥時即容易斷成碎片，且髓絲層較緊密<ref name=Thomson/>，此物種<ref name=Brodo/>與{{link-sv|柔扁枝衣|Evernia divaricata}}<ref name=tibet/>、裸扁地衣<ref>{{cite web|page=44|author=CM Wetmore|title=Keys to the Lichens of China|year=2003|url=https://conservancy.umn.edu/handle/11299/164294|access-date=2018-09-21|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161022155056/http://conservancy.umn.edu/handle/11299/164294|archive-date=2016-10-22|dead-url=no}}</ref>皆未有發現粉芽。
